parameters.name: FLUX
parameters.description: Proton number flux 70-6800 keV in 9 energy and 8 pitch angle bins (as energy-angle displays)

parameters.name: FLUX_byE_atA
parameters.description: Proton number flux at 8 pitch angles as spectrograms by energy

parameters.name: FLUX_byE_atA_stackPA0
parameters.description: Proton number flux as a stack_plot of 9 energies at the Bin1 angle (often ~15 deg)

parameters.name: FLUX_byE_atA_stackPA1
parameters.description: ---> As a stack_plot at the Bin2 angle (often ~35 deg)

parameters.name: FLUX_byE_atA_stackPA2
parameters.description: ---> As a stack_plot at the Bin3 angle (often ~57 deg)

parameters.name: FLUX_byE_atA_stackPA3
parameters.description: ---> As a stack_plot at the Bin4 angle (often ~80 deg)

parameters.name: FLUX_byE_atA_stackPA4
parameters.description: ---> As a stack_plot at the Bin5 angle (often ~102 deg)

parameters.name: FLUX_byE_atA_stackPA5
parameters.description: ---> As a stack_plot at the Bin6 angle (often ~123 deg)

parameters.name: FLUX_byE_atA_stackPA6
parameters.description: ---> As a stack_plot at the Bin7 angle (often ~145 deg)

parameters.name: FLUX_byE_atA_stackPA7
parameters.description: ---> As a stack_plot at the Bin8 angle (often ~165 deg)

parameters.name: FLUX_byA_atE
parameters.description: Proton number flux at 9 energies as spectrograms by pitch angle

parameters.name: FLUX_byA_atE_stackE0
parameters.description: Proton number flux as a stack plot of 8 pitch angles at the Ch1 energy (often ~70 keV)

parameters.name: FLUX_byA_atE_stackE1
parameters.description: ---> As a stack plot at the Ch2 energy (often ~130 keV)

parameters.name: FLUX_byA_atE_stackE2
parameters.description: ---> As a stack plot at the Ch3 energy (often ~210 keV)

parameters.name: FLUX_byA_atE_stackE3
parameters.description: ---> As a stack plot at the Ch4 energy (often ~330 keV)

parameters.name: FLUX_byA_atE_stackE4
parameters.description: ---> As a stack plot at the Ch5 energy (often ~550 keV)

parameters.name: FLUX_byA_atE_stackE5
parameters.description: ---> As a stack plot at the Ch6 energy (often ~1.0 MeV)

parameters.name: FLUX_byA_atE_stackE6
parameters.description: ---> As a stack plot at the Ch7 energy (often ~2.1 MeV)

parameters.name: FLUX_byA_atE_stackE7
parameters.description: ---> As a stack plot at the Ch8 energy (often ~4.4 MeV)

parameters.name: FLUX_byA_atE_stackE8
parameters.description: ---> As a stack plot at the Ch9 energy (often ~6.8 MeV)

parameters.name: PANGLE
parameters.description: Time-varying proton pitch angles in 8 angular bins

parameters.name: ENERGY_filled
parameters.description: ---> Time-varying proton energies in 9 channels

parameters.name: VSW
parameters.description: SW Velocity vector (from ions and ground-based processing)

parameters.name: MAGF
parameters.description: Vector magnetic field

parameters.name: TIME
parameters.description: UNIX time; seconds since January 1, 1970
